form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Petition to Classify Status of Alien Relative for Issuance of Immigrant Visa, FORM-130

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service Form approved OMB No. 43 R0401 Date filed $10.00 Fee stamp PETITION TO American Embassy aipei CLASSIFY STATUS OF ALIEN RELATIVE FOR JUL 10 1975 WHP ISSUANCE OF IMMIGRANT VISA JUL 10 1975 Wesley H. Parsons American Consui F0450108 JUL 10 1975 TO THE SECRETARY OF STATE: The petition was filed on Remarks The petition is approved for status under Following documents seen and returned section: Proof of citizenship/E SPOUSE, JUL 10 1975 Marriage certificate 201 (b) CHILD 203 (a) (2) DATE Divorce dearee, petitioner OF ACTION Divorce deeree, beneficiary 201 (b) PARENT 203 (a) (4) Birth certificate, petitioner DD Birth certificate, beneficiary Wesley H. Parsons Household registration 203 (a) (1) 203 (a) (5) DISTRICT American Consul (PETITIONER IS NOT TO WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE) 1. Petition is hereby made to classify the status of the alien beneficiary for issuance of an immigrant visa as: (Check one) The spouse, child (regardless of age), parent, brother, or sister of a United States citizen. The spouse or unmarried child (regardless of age) of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence. Block I. - Information About Alien Beneficiary 2. Name (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 3. Do Not Write in This Space 4. Relationship of beneficiary to petitioner Mother HO (Yuen) Wai Fong 6. Are beneficiary and petitioner related by adoption? 5. Other names used; (including maiden name if married woman) No Yuen Wai Fong 9. Beneficiary's marital status: 7. Place of birth (Country) 8. Date of birth (Month, day, year) II China IS Married Widowed Divorced 8-5-1911 Single 12. Has this beneficiary ever been in the U.S.? 10. Petitioner's name (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 11. Petitioner's phone WORLAND Ruth Fung 8714624 Yes No 13. Name of beneficiary's spouse, if married, and date and country of birth (Omit this item if petition is for your spouse) HO, Lun Sin 10-21-1906 China 14. Names, birthdates and countries of birth of beneficiary's children, if any See attached sheet 15. Full address of beneficiary's spouse and children, if any (Omit this item if petition is for your spouse) #37-2, Lane 60 Kuang Fu Rd. North Taipei Republic of China (105) 16. If this petition is for your spouse or child, give the following: a. Date and place of your present marriage b. Number of your prior marriages C. Number of prior marriages of spouse d. Last address at which you and your spouse resided together From To (Town or city) (State or Province) (Country) (Apt. No.) (Number and street) (Month) (Year) (Month) (Year) 17. If this petition is for a child, (a). Is the child married? (b). Is the child your adopted child? If so, give the names, dates, and places of birth of all other children adopted by you. If none, so state. 18. If this petition is for a brother or sister, are both your parents the same as the alien's parents? If not, submit a separate statement giving full details as to parentage, dates of marriage of parents, and the number of previous marriages of each parent. 19. If separate petitions are also being submitted for other relatives, give names of each and relationship to petitioner. HO, , Lun Sin Father 20. Have you ever filed a petition for this alien before? No If so, give place and date of filing and result. FORM I-130 (REV.6-1-73) Y RECEIVED TRANS. IN RET'D-TRANS OUT COMPLETED
